mapper.insert: insert into cosord_details(odnum, aid, onum, conum, oddate) values(cosordd_seq.nextval, #{aid}, #{onum}, #{conum}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select odnum,aid,onum,od.conum,oddate,coteacher,cosubject,coimage,coprice,coname from cosord_details od, courses c where od.conum=c.conum and onum=#{onum} order by odnum
